short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always display the QR code of your current tab in a corner of the screen. Perfect for streaming web browser sessions!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OmniQR Code Viewer displays a QR code in the corner of your screen.

It is intended for streamers, or anyone who wants to be able to easily share the URL of a currently-viewed browser tab.

OmniQR is 100% privacy-friendly and open-source (MIT License)
